channel.description: Recent content in familia on BJWry

item.title: If life ended here
item.author: johnwry@gmail.com (BJWry)
item.description: If life ended here…# If life ended with physical death, then human beings should be pitied. We’re better not being cognizant of eternity and ceasing to exist link animals. John 3:16 (note:43.3.16)For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. God so loved the world... John 10:10b I came so that they would have life, and have it abundantly.

item.title: Si esto fuera el fin
item.author: johnwry@gmail.com (BJWry)
item.description: Que Triste seria si la muerte es el final# Hoy Cerramos el capítulo de la vida de# una madre abuela / bis-abuela tia "mama reina" esposa Una historia de amor# Conoce a Bernardo Su Familia: "no te conviene ese joven" Decide por el amor: más de 6 decadas junto a su esposo Cria a sus hijos con amor Nos recuerda al amor de Dios# pudo haber dicho "ese John, no me conviene", "esa gente no me conviene"
